Sector.Name: Hollow
Sector.Credits: Hollow sector was designed by Ade Stewart as part of Where The Stars End. The data provided for the sector includes social details for only a few worlds: the region has been remotely surveyed, which has provided extensive physical information about the other stars, features, and worlds that lie within it.
Sector.Stylesheet: border.Dr { color: blue; style: dotted } route { style: dashed }
